mapper.select: SELECT re_no , re_category , re_parent_no , re_mem_id , (SELECT mem_name FROM member WHERE re_mem_id = mem_id) AS re_mem_name , re_content , re_ip , TO_CHAR(re_reg_date, 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI') AS re_reg_date , TO_CHAR(re_mod_date, 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI') AS re_mod_date FROM reply WHERE re_category = #{reCategory} AND re_parent_no = #{reParentNo} ORDER BY re_no DESC

SELECT re_no , re_category , re_parent_no , re_mem_id , (SELECT mem_name FROM member WHERE re_mem_id = mem_id) AS re_mem_name , re_content , re_ip , TO_CHAR(re_reg_date, 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI') AS re_reg_date , TO_CHAR(re_mod_date, 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI') AS re_mod_date FROM reply WHERE re_no = #{reNo}
